Math Olympiads

I've spent a good amount of my highschool years preparing for math olympiads. I used to love solving math olympiad problems and even thought I've grown up, I still find myself finding enjoyment and satisfaction thinking and solving math olympiad problems. Checkout my math olympiad corner to learn more!
